channel.title: Wilderness #317 - Looking for programmers!
channel.description:
[center]Working on a new website: [url=http://wilderness.ulmb.com]http://wilderness.ulmb.com[/url] [IMG]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/8058/wilderness.png[/img] Recruiting for team members, willing to pay for a programmer.
Please support our project by clicking on the link Below: [URL=http://"http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/support.php?id=Wilderness"]Click here![/URL]
We are currently in need of the following positions! [list] [*]Developer
[B]Welcome to Wilderness.[/B] The goal of Wilderness is to create an nearly perfect PK server, just like the old runescape from 2006-2008. While achieving perfect pking, we will still try to have a balanced economy for fun gameplay. An example of this would be, if you were PKing and the other player had a whip, and you killed him for it, you would actually get excited because it means something, and has a price. By this I mean you'd actually have to kill quite a few Abyssal Demons before you actually get a whip, or skill non-stop to create money for it. The next part of this, is the feeling of the old runescape wilderness. No overpowered bullshit, I don't want to have dragon claws or any of those over-powered weapons. The only newer items i'd implement are maybe shields, because I believe 317 runescape doesn't have enough decent shields. You would only see Dragon-fire shields, Spirit shields, and Helm of neitiznot as the newer items. That's pretty much the main idea of it, and since I have nothing else I can think of right now to write here, let's continue.
We need a programmer soon, so please don't hesitate to apply. Post here or PM me if you wish to apply privately.[/center]

item.title: Wilderness #317 - Looking for programmers!
item.dc:creator: @Skeppa Skeppa
item.description:
@Skeppa wrote:

[center]Working on a new website: http://wilderness.ulmb.com

Recruiting for team members, willing to pay for a programmer.

Please support our project by clicking on the link Below:
Click here!

We are currently in need of the following positions!
[list]
[*]Developer

Welcome to Wilderness.
The goal of Wilderness is to create an nearly perfect PK server,
just like the old runescape from 2006-2008. While achieving perfect pking,
we will still try to have a balanced economy for fun gameplay.
An example of this would be, if you were PKing and the other player had a whip,
and you killed him for it, you would actually get excited because it means something,
and has a price. By this I mean you’d actually have to kill quite a
few Abyssal Demons before you actually get a whip, or skill non-stop
to create money for it. The next part of this, is the feeling of the old
runescape wilderness. No overpowered bullshit, I don’t want to
have dragon claws or any of those over-powered weapons. The only newer items
i’d implement are maybe shields, because I believe 317 runescape
doesn’t have enough decent shields. You would only see
Dragon-fire shields, Spirit shields, and Helm of neitiznot as the newer items.
That’s pretty much the main idea of it, and since
I have nothing else I can think of right now to write here, let’s continue.

We need a programmer soon, so please don’t hesitate to apply.
Post here or PM me if you wish to apply privately.[/center]
